name: Nightmare Park
description: Your aim is to cross Nightmare Park from S to F without dying by completing various tasks that you come across. A map of the park is shown and you move in a North, South, East or West direction along the paths. As you move you will come across creatures and these need destroying or for them to let you go in a variety of mini-games. The various games you will play vary and these include, guess a number in a certain amount of moves, destroy approaching zombies and give an ogre a name that flashes on the screen. You will also come across situations like poison arrows coming towards you hoping they will miss, or being sent back to the start. If you fail in any game then it is game over.
